name: The Game Ever
description:
this is the discreptionhsnvfdghjfdijm

Game made in scratch, converted in turbowarp packager

Scratch version - https://scratch.mit.edu/projects/765240434/

Welcome to the game ever, a cool game made by a cool person in a not so cool programming language

Mod steps:

mod the game ever

1. get the scratch version

2. look inside the project

3. download the project

4. go to turbowarp.org

5. go inside and load the downloaded project

6. modify the project

7. use packager.turbowarp.org to convert

to a game file

8. share it anywhere (a example is mediafire)

9. you modified the game ever

Indie game, made by I_like.chip.
